title: Did Joni Ernst Get Early COVID-19 Vax After Calling Virus Hoax, Opposing Masks?
subtitle: A widely coshared meme accused the Republican senator from Iowa of rank hypocrisy.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. Sen. Joni Ernst received the COVID-19 vaccine after calling COVID-19 a "hoax," being an "anti-masker," and claiming doctors exaggerated the number of COVID-related deaths in order to enrich themselves.
